These supple leather boots are studded with tiny crystals.

Activateâ€”Chiming Steps 1 (auditory, concentrate, sonic)

Frequency once per day

Effect Stride up to half your Speed. The crystals ring out with pleasant-sounding chimes that reverberate painfully in the ears of others. Each creature that you pass adjacent to during your Stride takes @Damage[4d8[sonic]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:24|basic] save); a creature takes this damage only once. A creature who critically fails the save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 minute.
